snippet.title: Need for Speed: Undercover PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
Need for Speed: Undercover PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: November 18, 2008
Platforms: Microsoft Windows, Nintendo DS, PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, Wii, Xbox 360 
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: OpenGL (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 4x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
_____________________________________________
Requested by: Filippo Galli, Stagmyte
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 12GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Ultimate
_____________________________________________
Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
